update xl_exam
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point_score = #{pointScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select: SELECT es.id, es.exam_id examId, es.subject_id subjectId, ps.audio, psd.type, psd.guide, psd.question, psd.guide_audio guideAudio, psd.read_time readTime, psd.question_audio questionAudio, psd.write_time writeTime, psd.score, psd.original_text originalText, po.result, po.point_result pointResult, po.correct_result correntResult FROM xl_exam e LEFT JOIN xl_exam_subject es ON e.id = es.exam_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject ps ON ps.id = es.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_subject_detail psd ON ps.id = psd.subject_id LEFT JOIN xl_paper_option po ON psd.id = po.detail_id where e.id = #{value} ORDER BY ps.id, psd.id
